str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To dissemble with, play a part with. From sun and hupokrinomai; to act hypocritically in concert with.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From hupokrinomai; acting under a feigned part, i.e. deceit.
Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and apago; to take off together, i.e. Transport with.
